tool_description: Analyzes soil strength parameters from triaxial, direct shear, and unconfined compression tests, calculating cohesion, friction angle, and other strength characteristics.

sample_ids.description: List of sample IDs with strength test data

test_type.description: Type of strength test: triaxial, direct_shear, or unconfined

drainage_condition.description: Drainage condition: drained, undrained, or consolidated_undrained

failure_criterion.description: Failure criterion to apply: mohr_coulomb or drucker_prager

confining_pressures.description: Confining pressures used in triaxial tests (kPa)

correction_factors.description: Apply standard correction factors for area and membrane effects

error_messages: Invalid sample IDs: One or more samples do not have the specified strength test data.
Unsupported test type: Use one of [triaxial, direct_shear, unconfined].
Invalid drainage condition: Use one of [drained, undrained, consolidated_undrained].
Unsupported failure criterion: Use either mohr_coulomb or drucker_prager.
Invalid confining pressures: All values must be positive numbers.
Insufficient test data: Samples must have complete stress-strain data for analysis.
usage: Specify sample_ids, test_type, and drainage_condition. For triaxial tests, provide confining_pressures. Optionally set failure_criterion and correction_factors.

cohesion_values.description: Cohesion values in kPa for each sample

peak_strengths.description: Peak shear strength values in kPa
